unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Heard it's his back again. Dr. Sharma's team at Lilavati Hospital is looking at it, right? Hope he's back soon for the Asia Cup. Rs. 500 says he'll be bowling at Eden Gardens! Also, what about that kabaddi player, Rohan? Knee injury, 2 weeks out? Heard it happened during practice at the SAI centre, 1000 sq ft area. Get well soon, both of you!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Heard it's his back again. Doctor Sharma's team at Lilavati Hospital is looking at it, right? Hope he's back soon for the Asia Cup. Rupee five hundred says he'll be bowling at Eden Gardens! Also, what about that kabaddi player, Rohan? Knee injury, two weeks out? Heard it happened during practice at the S A I centre, one thousand square feet area. Get well soon, both of you!
